note.p: Naturalist. Of Kingsbridge, Devonshire. Made a collection of British shells, and engaged in dredging investigations. Friend of William Elford Leach, who named a hermit crab after him. Presented a collection of crustacea to the Plymouth Institution and left other specimens to Kingsbridge. Fellow of the Linnean Society, 1813.
Proceedings of the Linnean Society (1869–70): civ–cv
